data.name: Super Buckyball Tournament
data.detailed_description:
Select Your Character


About the Game





Super Buckyball Tournament is an arcade-style football championship set in the not-so-distant future. Do you have what it takes to bring home the ultimate trophy? Pass, kick and fight your way up the ranks and become a Buckyball champion today!



Take part in exciting 3v3 and 4v4 matches where you will be fighting for your spot at the top of the leaderboards. Every game is a new experience because of the dozens of combinations of characters you can play!



Storm the field as a forward, Gear up with a defender or pick one of the balance characters and help your teammates setup goal scoring opportunities. In Super Buckyball Tournament, you get the power to choose who and how you play.



Stylize your characters with a collection of trendy costumes and outfits to fit your personalisation needs!





Work with teammates to create your own style. Express yourself with free-flowing gameplay that allows for as much or as little creativity as you can come up with.



Set foot on one of the many fields that make up the universe. From the crowd-filled Dragon Stadium to the rooftops of Mist City, there is quite a variety of views to see.





The Singleplayer career mode allows you to act as the team manager, manage player transfers and bring them to your lineup. Level them up, unlock new abilities, and even swap between them during live matches so you always get decisive control over your games!



Get ready to spice it up with additional game modes for more fun and joy!

data.short_description: Super Buckyball Tournament is an action multiplayer sports game where you take one of over a dozen unique characters, each with their own superpowers, into intense online or singleplayer matches for competitive or casual play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 OR HIGHER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
